Description: Round-topped sandstone stela; scene of Usersatet offering to Thoth; seven columns of Hieroglyphic text above, five rows below.
Curator's comments: Published: HTBM Part 7: Plate XXXIV PM VII, p.141. Randall-Maciver and Woolley, Buhen (Philadelphia 1911), 96.
Exhibition history: 2021-2022 16 Sept-9 Jan, Budapest, Museum of Fine Arts, The discovery of the Pharaoh's tomb, Amenhotep II and his time
